MODULE.name: ScreenOrientation
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: The ScreenOrientation Module is used to control the screen orientation/layout and register to receive an event when it changes.

PROPERTIES.DESC: Properties used to configure Screen Orientation module

PROPERTY.name: autoRotate
PROPERTY.DESC: Enables or Disables autorotation of the screen orientation when the device is rotated.

PROPERTY.name: screenOrientationEvent
PROPERTY.DESC: The screen orientation event is sent when the current RhoElements application changes the orientation of the screen. For devices with an inbuilt accelerometer this event will also be sent when the user physically rotates the device to a new orientation.

METHOD.name: normal
METHOD.DESC: Sets the screen orientation to default orientation

METHOD.name: rightHanded
METHOD.DESC: Sets the screen orientation to righthanded orientation. Note the webpage will not reformat in line with the new screen size automatically.

METHOD.name: leftHanded
METHOD.DESC: Sets the screen orientation to lefthanded orientation. Note the webpage will not reformat in line with the new screen size automatically.

METHOD.name: upsideDown
METHOD.DESC: Sets the screen orientation to upside down, useful if presenting the device to a customer to obtain a signature.
